title: Tricking the "Create snippet" feature into displaying the wrong filetype can lead to RCE on Slack users

profile.name: Slack
profile.about: All your team communication in one place, instantly searchable, and available wherever you go.

weakness.name: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type

summaries.content: An issue in Slack's Create snippet feature results in filetypes being displayed incorrectly. This can lead to RCE if a Slack user downloads an executable file thinking that it is a CSV or other benign file type.
